name: cf-ai-slack-summarizer-frontend
description: React frontend for AI Slack Summarizer

scripts.install-backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000
scripts.setup: npm run install-frontend && npm run install-backend
scripts.format-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && black . && isort .
